p: The four actinobacteria disks cultured on ISP2 medium for 4–7 days at 28°C were placed onto the agar surface at four equidistant points, 2.5 cm from the plate periphery ( Loqman et al., 2009). Plates with pathogenic fungi alone served as a control. All agar plates were wrapped with parafilm and incubated at 28 ± 2°C for 3–5 days and observed for the inhibition of the pathogen.
